passive.name: JUNKYARD TITAN
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) JUNKYARD TITAN
                                Every ability Rumble casts generates Heat.While above 50 Heat, Rumble enters the Danger Zone, causing his basic abilities to gain bonus effects. When he reaches 150 Heat, he becomes Overheated for 4 second(s).Overheated: Silences himself, but gains 55% bonus Attack Speed () and empowers his attacks to deal additional magic damage equal to 5 (2.5 + 2.5 () + 20% ) plus 5% of the target's max Health.Percent damage Is limited to 65-150 () on monsters.

q.name: (Q) FLAMESPITTER
q.description:
(Q) FLAMESPITTER
 8/7/6/5s  
                                
                                
                                Ignites his flamethrower, dealing 150 (150/190/230/270 + 110% ) plusÂ 6/8/10/12% of the target's max Health as magic damage over 3 second(s). The flamethrower deals 105% of this damage against minions.Danger Zone: Deals 225 (225/285/345/405 + 165% ) plus 9% of the'target's max Health as magic damage instead.Percent damage is limited to 65-150 damage () on monsters.

w.name: (W) SCRAP SHIELD
w.description:
(W) SCRAP SHIELD
 5s  
                                
                                
                                Tosses up a barrier, gaining a shield that absorbs 87 damage (45/80/115/150 + 6% of max Health  + 35% ) for 1.5 second(s) and 20/25/30/35% Movement Speed for 1 second(s).Danger Zone: Gains 30/37.5/45/52.5% Movement Speed and a shield that absorbs 129.5 damage (67.5/120/172.5/225 + 9% of max Health  + 45% ) instead.

e.name: (E) ELECTRO HARPOON
e.description:
(E) ELECTRO HARPOON
 0.5s  
                                
                                
                                Launches an electrified harpoon, dealing 60 magic damage (60/90/120/150 + 40% ), slowing by 30/35/40/5% for 1.5 second(s), and reducing the enemy's Magic Resist by 8/12/16/20% for 4 second(s).Hitting an enemy who is already slowed by Electro Harpoon increases the slow to 45/52.5/60/67.5% and Magic Resist reduction to 12/18/24/30%.Danger Zone: The harpoon deals 90 magic damage (90/135/180/225 + 60% ) instead, and the slow and Magic Resist reduction are increased by 50%.Charge: Gains a charge every 6 second(s), storing up to 2 charges.

r.name: (R) THE EQUALIZER
r.description:
(R) THE EQUALIZER
 80/70/60s  
                                
                                
                                Launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail on the ground on impact, dealing 700 magic damage (700/1050/1400 + 200% ) and slowing enemies in the trail by 45% over 5 second(s).Tap: Automatically searches for and attacks nearby targets based on your auto-aim settings.Drag: Drag the ability button to set the trail's starting point. After that, the ability automatically searches for and attacks nearby targets based on your auto-aim settings.Precise cast:1. Drag the ability button to set the trail's starting point. Hold until ready to cast.2. To confirm, tap the checkmark on the top left, or wait for the time limit if the Manual Aim Time Limit setting is enabled. To cancel, tap the "Back" button on the top left.3. Drag the ability button to set the trail's end point. Release to cast.Deals 30% damage to monsters.
